Caption: Dr. P. Subbaroyan (Minister for Transport and Communication) giving away prize to Mr. K. Mahesh. PTI Mr. Srinivasan (in suit), Mr. R.V.S. Mani (with tie and spectacles) and Mr. Surjit S Randhava (with tie, close to microphone) looking on. Identification by Mr. K. Narayanan, Mr. C.V. Sahasranamam and Mr. Anand Singh Bawa.
